del_default: DELETE FROM IGSDpictures WHERE (pi_ID = x'fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffe') LIMIT 1;
get_created: SELECT created FROM IGSDpictures WHERE pi_ID = %s;
get_image: SELECT picture FROM IGSDpictures WHERE pi_ID = %s;
put_new: INSERT INTO IGSDpictures VALUES (SYS_GUID(), %s, '%s', '%s', '%s') RETURNING pi_ID;
table_fmt: IGSDpictures (pi_ID UUID NOT NULL UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, image_id UUID, created DATETIME NOT NULL, params LONGTEXT NOT NULL, picture LONGTEXT NOT NULL);
